HOUSE.ending: with a gaze that practically confirms that this is the place you need to go to*

HOUSE.opening: Insistent, aren't we? Fine. Go check out
HOUSE.ending: . People like to tell tall tales about the shenanigans that go on at that place.

HOUSE.opening: I have the best idea, what if you tried going to
